page.title: 01MARKET RASEN-LOCATION
page.content: Whole area part of {West Lindsey {District Council}. Main town in area - Market Rasen pop. 3,500 Town Council 12 members Mayor elected annually Other village - Middle Rasen pop. 1200 Area situated NE of city of Lincoln to the W of the Lincolnshire Wolds. Area consists of undulating lowland maximum height 34m.above sea-level. Mixed farming with arable and sheep farming with average acreage per farm of about 300. The A46 Lincoln-Grimsby trunk road and the Rotherham - Louth road A631 cross in the area Lincoln-Grimsby railway line traverses area. The river Rase, tributary to the R. Ancholme, flows through the above settlements
